documents.document: Goooooood morning, beautiful people! Who’s up for #5b5 today? :)
Have a great week, everyone. Remember to smile and you’ll notice the sun shining inside and out <3 :)
@MsJiiKay That’s pure awesomeness, my friend. Really cool. All smiles! :)
@mrxinu Which of you won? ;)
@just1heather Oh, best of luck with your appointment tomorrow! I hope everything goes well.
@Jenntrick Excellent! And ditto on all accounts :)
@PearlKelly Thank you for the RT, Pearly :)
For me, today consists entirely of working out, dancing, singing and smiling! How about you? :)
Make your Sunday a Sun Day for yourself and everyone around you ☀ :)
“Defeat never comes to any man until he admits it.” ~Josephus Daniels #quote
Have a victorious weekend! ;)
@VIVIANLBRIDGES First you need to fix your aspect ratio from 1.33 to 1.5 at the source, then reprint to the correct size :)
Hello! I hope *you* are having a great weekend! :)
“There are no exceptions to the rule that everybody likes to be an exception to the rule.” ~Charles Osgood #quote
@MsJiiKay Awesomeness! Thank you so much for the #FF <3 :)
@danielleraexx Thank you for your kind listing, Danielle :)
@just1heather My pleasure entirely! Are you in? We’d love to have you :)
@misschanto Awww, thank you darling :) Hope you get well soon! <3
Ask me anything, and I might even answer ;) http://www.formspring.me/GoodQuotes
Please follow the beautiful #5b5 smiling people ☀ @BiPolaRican47 ☀ @KieraS ☀ @MsJiiKay ☀ @0_ll_0 ☀ @oOoOoBarracuda ☀ #FollowFriday :)
“The more you act like a lady, the more he’ll act like a gentleman.” ~Sydney Biddle Barrows #quote (works both ways, obviously) :)
@MsJiiKay That’s super cool, I’m proud of you Jii :) I’ve gotten some really sweet smiles back, as well <3 :)
@just1heather 5b5 is awesomeness with awesome people! :) http://twitter.com/Good_Quotes/status/9681185068 #5b5
Gooooooooood morning! ;)
“A smile is the universal welcome.” ~Max Eastman #quote #5b5
I hope your Five before Five went great today! I ran all day but I got all five in and loved it! :) How was yours? #5b5
A thought for today: “Running away will never make you free.” ~Kenny Loggins #quote
Hello bjuuuties! :)
@oOoOoBarracuda Great! So, are you in for today? :) #5b5
“The tragedy of life is what dies inside a man while he lives.” ~Albert Schweitzer #quote
@oOoOoBarracuda Certainly! Here’s where it all started: http://twitter.com/Good_Quotes/status/9681185068 :) #5b5
RT @Jim_Rohn_Quotes: “Work harder on yourself than you do on your job.” ~Jim Rohn #jimrohn #quote
How’s your “Five before Five” so far? Mine’s been extraordinary :) #5b5
@0_ll_0 Great to have you in, Amerie :)
“The minute you settle for less than you deserve, you get even less than you settled for.” ~Maureen Dowd #quote
Five before Five. I’m in. Are you? :)
@BiPolaRican47 Awesome! You’re a legend, Misael :)
Good morning! :)
“None of us is as good as all of us.” ~Ray Kroc #quote
@misschanto By all means :) <3 *BearHug*
“First be best, then be first.” ~Grant Tinker #quote
@misschanto Aww, thank you Jenny! <3 *hug* :)
Thank you all <3 “The greatest good you can do for another is not just share your riches, but to reveal to him, his own.” ~Benjamin Disraeli
@KieraS Excellent! Awesome to have you onboard, Kiera :)
Awww, thank you Monique @ORIGINALGATA and Danielle @danielleraexx *hug* :)
@MsJiiKay Awesome, way to go G! :)
Oh, 1000 tweets :) Huge thanks and big love to all of you wonderful beautiful people! <3 I propose a group hug ;)
How did your “Five before Five” go? Mine was excellent, been smiling like a nutter once again ;)
“… these things have always been the same, so why worry now” ~Mark Knopfler #lyrics #MusicMonday
“Why worry, there should be laughter after the pain, there should be sunshine after rain…” ~Mark Knopfler #lyrics #mm
“But baby, I’ll wipe away those bitter tears, I’ll chase away those restless fears, that turn your blue skies into grey…” ~Mark Knopfler #mm
“Baby, I see this world has made you sad, some people can be bad, the things they do, the things they say…” ~Mark Knopfler #lyrics #mm
Awesome Monday to everyone! :)
“The right to be heard does not automatically include the right to be taken seriously.” ~Hubert Humphrey :) #quote
So far we have @KieraS and @BiPolaRican47 in our “Five before Five” for tomorrow. Would you like to join us? :)
“A dead end street is a good place to turn around.” ~Naomi Judd #quote
How about you? Let’s do “five before five” tomorrow. Are you in? :)
@KieraS Let’s do it again tomorrow, are you in, Kiera? :)
“My father had a profound influence on me: he was a lunatic.” ~Spike Milligan :) #quote
“The only real mistake is the one from which we learn nothing.” ~John Powell #quote
@Jenntrick I will, you too! :)
@PearlKelly Thank you Pearly, very kind of you :)
“Truth is what works.” ~William James #quote
@MsJiiKay What a question, and only 140 characters to answer! I’ll just say: love. Thank you for the awesome #FF love <3 :)
@KieraS Oh, did you miss today’s exercise? :) http://twitter.com/Good_Quotes/status/9681185068
Ask me anything, and I might even answer ;) http://www.formspring.me/GoodQuotes
@BiPolaRican47 Excellent! Keep it up bro :)
@Jenntrick Aww, thank you dear :)
So, how did it go? Did you get “five before five”? :)
@SUPERRROCKSTAR Thank you for the #FF love :)
“Every time you smile at someone, it is an action of love, a gift to that person, a beautiful thing.” ~Mother Teresa #quote
I propose an exercise for today: before the clock strikes 5pm smile at five random people, bring them sunshine ☀, and tell us about it :)
@just1heather Hope you had your share of smiles, in spite of the busy schedule :)
“If you smile when no one else is around, you really mean it.” ~Andy Rooney #quote
@misschanto Awww, your absolution is very much appreciated ;)
Hey you beautiful people, how’s your day been? I’ve been smiling like a proper lunatic all day, I hope you’ve had an awesome day as well :)
“You cannot be a leader, and ask other people to follow you, unless you know how to follow, too.” ~Sam Rayburn #quote
“Even people who claim everything is predestined, and that we can do nothing to change it, look before they cross the road.” ~S. Hawking
“You won’t be lost, hurt, tired and lonely, something beautiful will come your way” ~Robbie Williams #quote #lyrics
“May you find that love that won’t leave you, may you find it by the end of the day…” ~Robbie Williams #quote #lyrics
“I’m not afraid of anything in this world, there’s nothing you can throw at me that I haven’t already heard” ~Bono #lyrics #MusicMonday
“Ride the wild wind, push the envelope, don’t sit on a fence, ride the wild wind, live life on the razor’s edge” ~Roger Taylor #MusicMonday
“… bedtime stories, morning glories, blue skies, and the perfect life for you and me” ~Martin/Pessis #lyrics #MusicMonday
“Superfantastic, everything is beautiful, nothing’s too tragic, when it comes to happy people” ~Martin/Pessis #lyrics #MusicMonday
RT @Jim_Rohn_Quotes: “When you spend a day you have one less day to spend. Make sure you spend each one wisely.” ~Jim Rohn #jimrohn #quote
“Speak The Truth. Seek The Truth. Be The Truth.” ~Mariska Hargitay #quote
@just1heather I signed up with a really nice gym and did a double workout day :) How about you?
“I was obliged to be industrious. Whoever is equally industrious will succeed equally well.” ~Johann Sebastian Bach #quote
“Like stars across the sky, e per avvincere, tu dovrai vincere, we were born to shine, all of us here because we believe” ~Bocelli #mm
“To me, being an intellectual doesn’t mean knowing about intellectual issues—it means taking pleasure in them.” ~Jacob Bronowski #quote
Thank you for the #FF mentions @Jenntrick @sullivan1971 @SpiritAli @crispyoinkie @MariposaBonita_ @zbleumoon <3 :)
@roam2me You’re welcome, and thank you :)
“Being on a tightrope is living—everything else is waiting.” ~Karl Wallenda #quote
Do not forget that there is a beautiful world outside Twitter. Go, enjoy it! :) <3
“Be a first rate version of yourself, not a second rate version of someone else.” ~Judy Garland #quote
@just1heather Thank you, Heather, have a brilliant weekend with the family :)
@MariposaBonita_ Thank you, Charmaine :) <3
@Jenntrick Yes! We need you in our #5b5 team. Wanna join? :)
Have an awesome weekend, you! Stay beautiful :) <3
For extra ☼ follow these beautiful #5b5 smiling people @BiPolaRican47 @KieraS @MsJiiKay @0_ll_0 @oOoOoBarracuda @just1heather #FollowFriday
